feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries for multiple frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables with light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading the React app and defining SEO metadata.
frontend/src/components/landing/BookingS: Booking form generating a WhatsApp message after validating name and area.
frontend/src/components/landing/Coverage: Coverage text listing all supported service areas.
frontend/src/components/landing/Floating: Fixed floating WhatsApp button linking to chat.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero banner with gradient background, tagline, and call/WhatsApp CTAs.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingF: Footer with branding, call/WhatsApp buttons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingN: Sticky navigation bar with site title and smooth‑scroll booking button.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes all landing page sections including nav, hero, services, coverage, areas, booking, footer, and WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/landing/OurWorkS: Empty placeholder file for a removed gallery section.
frontend/src/components/landing/Services: Displays four text‑based service cards in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/ServiceAreasSect: Displays 14 service areas in a responsive grid with a home‑service note.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login/clear functions, and status flags using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and service-area color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended animations, typography, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current ICP dapp scaffold, features, and UI structure for a Gujarati AC service landing site.
